tool_description: An API Database of web development skills.
name: Web Dev Skills
title: Web Dev Skills

api_list.name: Get skill by name
api_list.description:
Replace {name} with skill name you need, for example javascript.
if skill name contains:
-spaces, replace them with "-", e.g. Tailwind CSS > tailwind-css,
-dots,  just delete them, e.g. Vue.js > vuejs.
it's best to use lowercase but uppercase will also work :)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://web-dev-skills.p.rapidapi.com/v1/skill/javascript"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web-dev-skills.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://web-dev-skills.p.rapidapi.com/v1/skill/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web-dev-skills.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Skill by id
api_list.description: Gives you skill selected using id, which is number 1-113.

api_list.name: Get All Skills Data
api_list.description: This endpoint will return array of web development skills objects, with name, icon, website url , stack  and short description.
